GameItemType.Description: When it is worn, this totem protects from magical light attacks.

GameModifier.Provides: When it is worn, this totem protects from magical light attacks.

GameItemType.Description: Aldergest's blade is a mighty weapon, but also a tool to heal. The sword chooses its wielder, that the wielder might stand in defense of the helpless and small things of Elemental.

GameModifier.Provides: Aldergest's blade is a mighty weapon, but also a tool to heal. The sword chooses its wielder, that the wielder might stand in defense of the helpless and small things of Elemental.
::: Wellspring ::: ::: ((6 + Life Shards) x4) HP ::: Applies to all Allies
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja

GameItemType.Description: Enchanted to exude lightrays that, up close, can melt through hardened steel. Masters of such energies may find this sword fortifies their efforts.

GameModifier.Provides: Enchanted to exude lightrays that, up close, can melt through hardened steel. Masters of such energies may find this sword fortifies their efforts.
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja

GameItemType.Description: This sword carries a powerful ward that floods the grip of the wielder with intense pain. Only when one is so passionately intent on doing justice - however interpreted - that they will endure the pain, does the ward relent.

GameModifier.Provides: This sword carries a powerful ward that floods the grip of the wielder with intense pain. Only when one is so passionately intent on doing justice - however interpreted - that they will endure the pain, does the ward relent.
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja

GameItemType.Description: This sword kills all light that touches it in a flowing cloud of fog. Flesh, too, decays in ctonact with it, and those who can master shadow will do better still with this sweapon in hand.

GameModifier.Provides: This sword kills all light that touches it in a flowing cloud of fog. Flesh, too, decays in ctonact with it, and those who can master shadow will do better still with this sweapon in hand.
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja

GameItemType.Description: This sword embodies power never meant for this world. Every moment spent holding its hilt is a battle against madness. Yet, woe to the armies that face it - for they are as lambs to the wolf.

GameModifier.Provides: This sword embodies power never meant for this world. Every moment spent holding its hilt is a battle against madness. Yet, woe to the armies that face it - for they are as lambs to the wolf.

::: Despair Of Uzzeraddax ::: ::: 2 HP per Level from ALL enemies ::: 2 DMG per Level to ALL enemies ::: Resistable
::: -1 HP for caster ::: Permanent penalty
::: Armor Pierce ::: ::: Ignores 66% of the target's DEF
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies
::: Beguile ::: ::: Target swings randomly in melee ::: 50% Chance to succeed ::: Resistable
::: Tangled Web ::: ::: 0 Dodge ::: 0 Move ::: Lasts 3 Actions ::: Resistable ::: GoNext

GameItemType.Description: Not yet fully developed, this young dragon is nontheless mighty beyond reckoning. Riding atop it, its fiery breath will be at your command.

GameModifier.Provides: Not yet fully developed, this young dragon is nontheless mighty beyond reckoning. Riding atop it, its fiery breath will be at your command.
::: Weak Fire Breath (Fire) ::: ::: (ATK x0.75) DMG ::: Applies to all targets within a 1 radius ::: Has a Range of 3 ::: Resistable
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: This ring protects from magical shadow attacks.

GameModifier.Provides: This ring protects from magical shadow attacks.

GameItemType.Description: This shield chooses its owner, one who will stand up to evil and defend the weak. It is said that in times of incredible need, Ebleramis can hold back Death itself.

GameModifier.Provides: This shield chooses its owner, one who will stand up to evil and defend the weak. It is said that in times of incredible need, Ebleramis can hold back Death itself.
::: Protection From Death ::: ::: If killed, resurrected w/ 50% HP. Once. ::: -1 HP (Permanent penalty)
::: Shield Bash ::: ::: DMG + Moves back target
::: Defender Shield ::: ::: +1 Defense ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Defender

GameItemType.Description: This shield is bent and rusted beyond any usefulness. But when raised by a warrior mad enough to put ideals over their very flesh, powerful magic hardens this bizarre creation into a bulwark tougher than any natural product of the forge.

GameModifier.Provides: This shield is bent and rusted beyond any usefulness. But when raised by a warrior mad enough to put ideals over their very flesh, powerful magic hardens this bizarre creation into a bulwark tougher than any natural product of the forge.
::: Shield Bash ::: ::: DMG + Moves back target
::: Defender Shield ::: ::: +1 Defense ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Defender

GameItemType.Description: This strange presence may have once been a warg, or perhaps a murdered maiden. Atop it, you will move swiftly about the battlefield, and improve your spell resistance and casting efficiency.

GameModifier.Provides: This strange presence may have once been a warg, or perhaps a murdered maiden. Atop it, you will move swiftly about the battlefield, and improve your spell resistance and casting efficiency.

GameItemType.Description: This War Boar has keen control over its fury. Until combat begins.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: This lupine specimen moves swift as shadows.

GameModifier.Provides: This lupine specimen moves swift as shadows, and will lend you its savage jaws when you need them.

GameItemType.Description: Even the steeds of Antheros were not this stout, graceful, and handsome. Atop this mighty steed you shall travel great distances at speed, and enemies will fear your charge.

GameModifier.Provides: Even the steeds of Antheros were not this stout, graceful, and handsome. Atop this mighty steed you shall travel great distances at speed, and enemies will fear your charge.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies
